articles.author: Vivian Ho
articles.title: Emperor penguin found on Australian beach, thousands of miles from home - The Washington Post
articles.description: The emperor penguin was found on an Australian beach near the coastal town of Denmark, more than 2,200 miles from its Antarctic habitat.
articles.content:
The emperor penguin was malnourished, alone and on a popular beach in southwest Australia, waddling through the sand morethan 2,000 miles from its natural habitat.
